ch0024_40_shikimi/0101_0701_02_10:
Please come help me do some research for my
next novel tonight!
ch0024_40_shikimi/7101_0701_01_10:
Do you remember any scary stories you were told
over and over again when you were young?
ch0024_40_shikimi/7101_0701_02_10:
Most of those stories are actually made up by
parents as cautionary tales.
ch0024_40_shikimi/7101_0701_03_10:
Though...I HAVE heard that some of those stories
are actually true...
ch0024_40_shikimi/7102_0701_01_10:
“’Ello, ’ello, hola! Ciao and bonjour!” said the
popular influencer, Iono, at the start of her live
stream...”
ch0024_40_shikimi/7102_0701_02_10:
Iono’s streams are so positive and uplifting! I tend
to watch them during my breaks from writing.
ch0024_40_shikimi/7103_0701_01_10: I’m not a fan of stories with a bitter aftertaste...
ch0024_40_shikimi/7103_0701_02_10:
If you’re going to write something, why not choose
a happy ending instead?
ch0024_40_shikimi/7104_0701_01_10:
I tend to see special Sweet Hearts around the
same time of year that costume festivals
come around...
ch0024_40_shikimi/7104_0701_02_10:
They’re so much more colorful than the ordinary
ones—I just love seeing them!
ch0024_40_shikimi/7105_0701_01_10:
Are you a fan of scary stories,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0024_40_shikimi/7105_0701_02_10:
At Pokéstar Studios in Unova, horror is quite
a popular movie genre!
ch0024_40_shikimi/1701_0701_01_10:
I was doing some research for my next
novel—a thriller—and found this. You can have it.
ch0024_40_shikimi/1701_0702_01_10: I promise it’s not haunted or anything like that!
ch0024_40_shikimi/2501_0701_01_10:
This is a story that someone from the Sinnoh
region told me...
ch0024_40_shikimi/2501_0701_02_10:
For some reason, they needed to travel across an
area with heavy snowfall. And when they did...
ch0024_40_shikimi/2501_0701_03_10:
They came across a small cabin in the mountains.
When they peeked inside, they saw a woman
there—all by herself—in the dim light...
ch0024_40_shikimi/2501_0701_04_10:
They thought it was odd, but exchanged a few
words with the woman before leaving the cabin.
ch0024_40_shikimi/2501_0701_05_10:
Just after leaving, they remembered they hadn’t
thanked the woman...
ch0024_40_shikimi/2501_0701_06_10:
and so they decided to make their way back to the
cabin. But when they arrived...
ch0024_40_shikimi/2501_0702_01_10:
Apparently, there are many eyewitness reports of
paranormal activity in the Sinnoh region.
ch0024_40_shikimi/2501_0702_02_10:
And Froslass is a Pokémon that contains the soul of
a woman lost on a snowy mountain—or so
they say...
ch0024_40_shikimi/2501_0702_03_10:
Do you think maybe the ghostly woman from that
story I told you could have been a Froslass?
ch0024_40_shikimi/2511_0701_01_10: I wanted to ask you for some advice...
ch0024_40_shikimi/2511_0701_02_10:
You see, I’m not sure what kind of protagonist I
want for my next novel.
ch0024_40_shikimi/2511_0701_03_10: Could I use you as inspiration for that character?
ch0024_40_shikimi/2511_0702_01_10:
You can get a clearer picture of your characters
by basing them off of people you already know.
ch0024_40_shikimi/2511_0702_02_10:
Also, you’re a fantastic person, so you’d make the
perfect protagonist!
ch0024_40_shikimi/2511_0702_03_10: Please, let me continue using you as a subject!
ch0024_40_shikimi/3001_0701_01_10:
*yawn* Oh, my apologies. I’m a night owl, so
I’m quite sleepy right now...
ch0024_40_shikimi/3003_0701_01_10:
I look forward to nighttime events. I can’t wait
to see what stories unfold.
ch0024_40_shikimi/3005_0701_01_10:
Tonight I’ll tell you a story that’s bound to send
shivers down your spine...
